attributes.action: make the Armed Forces Compensation Scheme a fairer scheme for injured Service personnel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current Armed Forces Compensation Scheme does not provide fair compensation for injured servicemen and women, nor does it take into account the totality of their injuries suffered whilst serving their country. We would ask that the Government to amend the scheme to ensure that injured members of the Armed Forces receive fair compensation and that any changes are retrospective to the start of the scheme (April 2005).

government_responses.details:
